channel.title: Vermont on Wheeler Genealogy
channel.description: Recent content in Vermont on Wheeler Genealogy

item.title: Carra Inez (Tuttle) Wheeler: Vermont Roots, Connecticut Years, Holyoke Home
item.description: Born in Windsor County, Vermont, Carra Inez Tuttle married John Edward Wheeler and raised a family through Connecticut before returning to Holyoke, Massachusetts.

item.title: What Was A. & O. S. Tuttle? A Research Note on the Cavendish Store and Holyoke Dry Goods
item.description: Evidence points to a Tuttle brothers’ store in Cavendish (1857) that later moved to Holyoke (1863) and shifted to dry goods. This post documents the trail and next steps.
